restlib

Class ConnectionInfoBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.ConnectionInfoBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class ConnectionInfoBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for generating instances of ConnectionInfo. ConnectionInfoBuilder instances can be reused; it is safe to call build() multiple times to build multiple ConnectionInfo instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addConnectionOption(ConnectionOption connectionOption)
      Adds the ConnectionOption to this builder's ConnectionOption set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addConnectionOptions(Iterable<ConnectionOption> connectionOptions)
      Adds each ConnectionOption to this builder's ConnectionOption set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addTrailerHeader(Header header)
      Adds the Header to this builder's Trailer header set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addTrailerHeaders(Iterable<Header> headers)
      Adds each header to this builder's Trailer header set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addTransferEncoding(TransferCoding transferEncoding)
      Adds the TransferEncoding to this builder's TransferEncoding list.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addTransferEncodings(Iterable<TransferCoding> transferEncodings)
      Adds each TransferEncoding to this builder's TransferEncoding list.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addUpgradeProtocol(Protocol upgradeProtocol)
      Adds the Protocol to this builder's Upgrade protocol set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addUpgradeProtocols(Iterable<Protocol> upgradeProtocols)
      Adds each Protocol to this builder's Upgrade protocol set.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addVia(Via via)
      Adds the Via to this builder's Via list.
      ConnectionInfoBuilder addVias(Iterable<Via> vias)
      Adds each Via to this builder's Via list.
      ConnectionInfo build()
      Returns a newly-created ConnectionInfo instance based on the contents of the ConnectionInfoBuilder.

      • addTrailerHeader

        public ConnectionInfoBuilder addTrailerHeader(Header header)
        Adds the Header to this builder's Trailer header set.

        Note: although not enforced, the HTTP specification does not allow the following headers fields in the Trailer header set:

        • Transfer-Encoding,
        • Content-Length,
        • Trailer.
        Parameters:
        header - the Header to add.
        Returns:
        this ConnectionOptionBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if header is null.

      • addTrailerHeaders

        public ConnectionInfoBuilder addTrailerHeaders(Iterable<Header> headers)
        Adds each header to this builder's Trailer header set.

        Note: although not enforced, the HTTP specification does not allow the following headers fields in the Trailer header set:

        • Transfer-Encoding,
        • Content-Length,
        • Trailer.
        Parameters:
        headers - the Headers to add.
        Returns:
        this ConnectionOptionBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if headers is null or contains a null element.
